panels.description:
| Value  | Meaning               |
| -----  | -------               |
| 0x0000 | running               |
| 0x0001 | dead                  |
| 0x0002 | start-pre             |
| 0x0003 | start                 |
| 0x0004 | exited                |
| 0x0005 | reload                |
| 0x0006 | stop                  |
| 0x0007 | stop-watchdog         |
| 0x0008 | stop-sigterm          |
| 0x0009 | stop-sigkill          |
| 0x000a | stop-post             |
| 0x000b | final-sigterm         |
| 0x000c | failed                |
| 0x000d | auto-restart          |
| 0x0010 | waiting               |
| 0x0020 | tentative             |
| 0x0021 | plugged               |
| 0x0030 | mounting              |
| 0x0031 | mounting-done         |
| 0x0032 | mounted               |
| 0x0033 | remounting            |
| 0x0034 | unmounting            |
| 0x0035 | remounting-sigterm    |
| 0x0036 | remounting-sigkill    |
| 0x0037 | unmounting-sigterm    |
| 0x0038 | unmounting-sigkill    |
panels.title: Shares

targets.query: SELECT mean("Percent_Idle_Time")  *-1 + 100 FROM "CPU" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "instance" = '_Total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT derivative(first("bytes_recv"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" = 'enp134s0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
